name: Sakuttomon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you play another Digimon with [Legend-Arms] in its traits by an effect, gain 1 memory.

name: Zubamon
effect: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less, you may play it without paying its memory cost. Add the rest to your hand.
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] If you have a Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

name: ZubaEagermon
effect: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less.
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] If you have a Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

name: Duramon
effect: [Your Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve into a card in your hand that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
digivolveEffect: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand for its DNA digivolve cost.

name: Durandamon
effect:
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, this Digimon gets +3000 DP and ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
[When Attacking] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon is [RagnaLoardmon], it doesn't activate [Security] effects on Option cards it checks.

name: RagnaLoardmon
dnaDigivolve: ＜DNA Digivolution: 0 from red Lv.6 + black Lv.6＞ Digivolve unsuspended with the 2 specified Digimon stacked on top of each other.
effect:
[When Digivolving] ＜Blitz＞ (This Digimon can attack when your opponent has 1 or more memory.) When DNA digivolving, for every 4 cards in this Digimon's digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 20 or less and trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When a card is removed from a player's security stack, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: Chikurimon
effect: [All Turns] Players can't reduce play costs.

name: Ludomon
effect: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, you may reveal the top card of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Add the rest to your hand.
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] While you have a Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, this Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞. (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)

name: TiaLudomon
effect: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Reboot＞ until the end of your opponent's turn. (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] While you have a Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, this Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞. (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)

name: RaijiLudomon
effect: [Opponent's Turn] This Digimon can't be deleted by your opponent's effects.
digivolveEffect: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand for its DNA digivolve cost.

name: BryweLudramon
effect:
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, your opponent's effects can't delete this Digimon or return it to its owner's hand or deck until the end of their turn.
[When Digivolving] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] While this Digimon is [RagnaLoardmon], it isn't affected by the effects of your opponent's Digimon.

name: Direct Smasher
effect:
While you have a Digimon with [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the highest DP.

name: Legend-Arms Alliance
effect:
[Main] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less in your hand without paying its memory cost. Then, place this card in your Battle Area.
[Main] ＜Delay＞ (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)
・Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Place those cards on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.
securityEffect: [Security] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less in your hand without paying its memory cost. Then, place this card in your Battle Area.
